This directory contains Linux and Windows binaries for the glslangValidator compiled from source.  

Installation: The executable in this directory is self sufficient, and can be 
placed where desired; in a test directory, or in a system path, etc.

Usage:  Execute glslangValidator with no arguments to get a usage statement.

Version included (retrieved using glslangValidator -v):
Glslang Version: 7.8.2853
ESSL Version: OpenGL ES GLSL 3.20 glslang Khronos. 8.2853
GLSL Version: 4.60 glslang Khronos. 8.2853
SPIR-V Version 0x00010300, Revision 1
GLSL.std.450 Version 100, Revision 1
Khronos Tool ID 8
SPIR-V Generator Version 7
GL_KHR_vulkan_glsl version 100
ARB_GL_gl_spirv version 100
